special_text:
[+1]: Tap up to one target creature or planeswalker and put a stun counter on it. Until your next turn, its activated abilities can't be activated for as long as it's tapped.
[-2]: [b][Exile target tapped creature.][/b] You gain life equal to its power.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a permanent an opponent controls becomes tapped, put a stun counter on it.”
Paradigm {1}{W} [i](You may cast this as a sorcery spell with only the text in square brackets for its paradigm cost.)[/i]
